metadata.name: Hawa Pre-reveal
metadata.description:
Widely acclaimed Japanese painter Hiroshi Sugito presents his very first collection, Hawa. Additionally, Hiroshi Sugito is also acknowledged as a contributor to the Tokyo-Pop movement. Each nft is a captivating work of art where each piece will entice people into his own graphical world and introduce a rhythmic relationship between colors and forms. 

Holders will be entitled to mint future collection. Holders will be worthy to request a physical print of the nft or display it in a future auction with proof of rights to ownership.
